bibl.title: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1935

p.seg: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1935 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the years 1932, 1933, and 1934.

To His Excellency, Governor Roy L. Cochran: "We respectfully submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 193 5. DEPARTMENT OP INSURANCE, C. SMRHA, Director.
